messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content:
Dear Voter,
Living in Manchester for most of my life, I can sympathise with the concerns of our local residents. Labour have let us down and have had it too easy in Manchester for decades. The Liberal Democrats have no credibility after being part of a Coalition Government that has seen mass, uncontrolled immigration and national debt continue to skyrocket since Labour's economic failures. You have a voice. You can vote for something better. That is UKIP.
Please Vote for me on May 7th.
yours sincerely, Phil Eckersley

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
UKIP will pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping our £55 million a day EU membership fee.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.

issues.brexitEurope: By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid
